name: The Greatest Froot Loops Delivery
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47.THEME: "Stuck in a loop".

-----------------------------------------------------------------

PLOT:

You are stuck in a Froot Loops delivery job that Toucan Sam convinced you into taking (he pays very well though). But wait, giant froot loops are falling from the sky? What?! Okay, that makes no sense, but THE THING IS that you have to catch those falling giant Loops and make them into stairs to reach the doors and make your delivery! Yup, I meant stairs.

REMEMBER THE PAY!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Touch the bottom of a door with the Froot Loop Stairs to stop place it, and then bring the Froot Loops box to the door by using the Froot Loop Stairs you just created.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Space Bar to jump.
  • Return Key to destroy caught loops.
  • P Key to pause.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

WELP, that’s my LD47 entry. The theme was "Stuck in a loop"!

Every single asset was completely made by me during the event!
